instruction.value: Upon urge to smoke, suck on lozenge until fully dissolved in mouth.
Upon strong temptation to smoke, suck on lozenge until fully dissolved in mouth.
Suck on lozenge until fully dissolved in mouth.

additionalnotes.value: 1 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke up to one pack per day. Maximum daily dose is 25 of the 1 mg lozenges.
Initial treatment period: Weeks 1 to 6. Recommended a minimum of 8 lozenges per day. 2 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette more than 30 minutes after waking up.
Step down treatment peroid: Weeks 7 to 9. 2 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette more than 30 minutes after waking up.
Step down treatment peroid: Weeks 10 to 12. 2 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette more than 30 minutes after waking up.
Initial treatment period: Weeks 1 to 6. Recommended a minimum of 8 lozenges per day. 4 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking up.
Step down treatment peroid: Weeks 7 to 9. 4 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking up.
Step down treatment peroid: Weeks 10 to 12. 4 mg dose recommended for patients who smoke their first cigarette within 30 minutes of waking up.
